Please check out our completely renewed Solution Center - it will help you choose the exact imager you need.

  • Our affordable Performance Series are for quick routine
    maintenance scans.
  • The Professional Series is a step up in performance for more
    detailed investigations and reliability inspections.
  • And the top-of-the-range Expert Series for advanced applications
    like R&D, quality control and complete predictive maintenance.

Many features are available only on Fluke instruments:

  • IR-OptiFlex™ gives automatic focusing
  • Patented IR-Fusion® technology with AutoBlend™ combines digital and IR images
  • Fluke Connect™ gives the ability to network the imager with other Fluke Connect™ devices to, for example, measure current running through a conductor while measuring its temperature from the camera’s display
  • Powerful SmartView® analysis and reporting software, included.

Whatever you are troubleshooting or maintaining, we have a thermal imager to suit. Learn more about which camera to choose on our renewed Solution Center
